name: G6 Scarlet BloodRed Parents
bio: Uh, hi! I'm G6 Scarlet BloodRed Parents. I enjoy spinning sick beats, glaring at the neighbour's cat, and reciting poetry. Sometimes I daydream of a life full of hitting on yo' man, ice cream, and sleeping in fresh laundry. We can be friends, but keep the ultra purrsonal stuff to yourself, please.
